snippet.title: Blue Blood | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
ABOUT BLUE BLOOD:
In a world where everything wants to destroy your family, surpass your limits for your loved ones. Explore a beautiful snowy mountain and platform through all the obstacles that may come forth with the help of a magical dash. Gather food for your children and unveil the misteries of this eerie place.

Blue Blood is an action platformer where you help a fox save its cubs from hunger. Jump and dash through a risky environment and gather all the food you can to save them.


DOWNLOAD:
https://pitarcus.itch.io/blue-blood


OTHER INFO:
This game started as a project for Game Engines subject at Universitat Jaume I. Since I was really excited I've been working to complete a short experience that is meaningful, so I hope you enjoy this journey!
